decision.reasoning:
The market is pricing Seattle at 57.6%, but most available sentiment/consensus signals point higher. The expert-pick aggregation has Seahawks favored by 48 of 58 (82.8%), which is a strong ‚Äúpanel‚Äù consensus even if experts tend to herd. Betting markets also lean Seattle: they‚Äôre ~4.5-point favorites, and the moneyline listed as Seahawks -231 implies roughly ~70% win probability before vig (still likely mid-to-high 60s after adjusting), notably above 57.6%. Public betting patterns show most spread bets/handle on Seattle (63% bets, 69% handle), consistent with a Seahawks-favored narrative; there is a counter-signal with more moneyline handle on the Patriots (59% ML money), suggesting some sharper/contrarian interest in the upset, which keeps my confidence from being ‚ÄúHIGH.‚Äù
Net: Seattle looks undervalued at 57.6% versus both expert consensus and implied odds, so I‚Äôll take a moderate-long position on YES.
